channel.title: Cars on Teopeurt's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cars on Teopeurt's Blog

item.title: About
item.description:
An opinionated polyglot, I do data, I do software, I do open-source, I love building distributed, connected services, with mobiles. development.

I sometimes teach Python using the Raspberry PI as a tool for pre-teen, teenagers and young adult from disadvantage backgrounds.

In my past life I used to work with software in high performance cars here, here and here, racing cars here, regular cars here.

I also tried to do something totally different in Computational Finance, realised that most of the theory was based on dodgy application of Physics, so decided do my own research into analysing risk and capital markets - similar in vein to Mandelbroit.

I also once tried to build a self-sustaining, self-healing network using Village Telco.
